sect1.title: Book Version
sect1.para: This is BLFS-BOOK version &version; dated &releasedate;. This version is a release candidate of the upcoming 6.2.0 release. It is almost complete, though there are still a few Trac bugs to address before the final release. A list of the still open Trac bugs (if there are any remaining at the time you read this) can be found at .
